issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Android aplication succesfull installs when debuging and developing but when packaging for Android app store it wont install in my min target sdk version <uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="16"/>.

The  problem began after 5.4.0.GA Update. I had to uninstall it and try to build with 5.3.1.GA, as it was working before. I publish the aplication in app store. Also the Appcelerator studio began to ask for 6.0 device, obviusly becaouse it only supports target 23, but it wont take the api directions in manifest.
fields.summary: Android: Aplication won't install after packaging for app store

comments.body: Hello, Send us the manifest section of your tiapp xml file that causing the issue to publish. We will look into it. Thanks.
